PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The characteristics of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / TiO x / Al devices are summarized in Table 5.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PC71BM |
| TiOx |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PC71BM |
| TiOx |

These are the material properties mentioned in the paragraph:

* ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
* PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
* PSS (Polystyrene sulfonate)
* PC71BM (Poly(cyclopentadienylene-co-phenylene)benzene-1,4-dimethyl-dicyanovinylene-2,5-diyl)
* TiOx (Titanium oxide)

Note that "Al" is not a material property, but rather an element symbol for aluminum.

* "Al" (this is an abbreviation for aluminum, but it is not clear what property of aluminum is being referred to)
